Satchel Health CEO Lanson Hyde said his telemedicine company is ready to scale. - Nashville Business Journal

Jumpstart Foundry is a platform for health care innovation.  We help large corporations harness innovation to build shareholder value and launch new innovative healthcare products in partnership with start-up and growth-stage private companies.More info:  www.jsf.co
One of two partners in this early-stage venture capital firm. • Identify new investment opportunities in Healthcare and Technology.

One of four partners in this early-stage venture capital firm.  •	Identify new investment opportunities in Atlanta, Raleigh, and Washington DC.  •	Introduced Pinpoint Networks Inc. to Massey Burch.  Pinpoint is a wireless software company headquartered in Raleigh and was one of the four deals that the firm invested in during 2002.•	Conduct due diligence on potential investment opportunities.  This involves reviewing the business plan, questioning the management team, researching the overall market, valuing the deal, forming a syndicate to fund the deal and drafting a term sheet.  •	Serve on the Board of Directors, for Confidential Business Resources, Inc. one of the fund’s portfolio companies.  Additionally, board observer for the following companies: Pinpoint Networks Inc., Prime Office Products and HCCA International.
